---
title: Data Science and Technology
---

Data Science and Technology (DST) is a theme within the [Institute for Transport Studies (ITS)](https://environment.leeds.ac.uk/transport) at the [University of Leeds](https://www.leeds.ac.uk/).
The theme joins-up data-intensive research across [ITS research groups](https://environment.leeds.ac.uk/transport-research), applying data science and machine learning techniques to transport and mobility challenges.
